text: Took my family to try this korean mala tang. Restaurant was empty when we reached on a working weekday evening, but still decided to go ahead anyway. The service was great - the lady welcomed us in and did an introduction of the menu. We ordered three types - malatang level 0 (non-spicy) for our kid, level 2, and malaban level level 2. All ingredients were well prepared to our satisfaction.
This is a spicy hotpot that can be enjoyed by everyone from children to adults. All the other menus are delicious as well~ The owner is also very kind!! I highly recommend it. ‚úåÔ∏èüëçüòã

As a traveler from LA KTown, my standards for K Mala Tang are high and I was pleasantly surprised by my find here. Ingredients were fresh, service was good, and the overall taste was great. I was particularly surprised by the fried chicken - the chicken was boneless yet tasted & looked like bone-in chicken (which in my book is vastly superior to boneless chicken). Will be going back when I am in the mood for Mala Tang.

Korean style mala is so good! Great food very nice staff and also really cheap drinks. Be sure to select the spiciness tho it could be a bit spicy. Overall a nice place.

Update 20/July 2024
Visited again and the new garlic chicken is so good!!! They have 0 spicy level too so even great for kids
The best !!! My friend and I go here almost every week. Great food and ambience! Super friendly staff and owners!
